description: Red sandstone texture with red sand palette - top has subtle speckling, side has horizontal banding

top.description: Red sand colored top face with subtle speckling

sides.description: Horizontal banded sides with red inclusions

base_colors.note: Red sand palette (TextureAtlas.java:1414-1416) with reduced variance for G (0.8) and B (0.6)

primary_noise.note: Same noise as sandstone top from TextureAtlas.java:1419-1421

base_colors.note: Red sand palette (TextureAtlas.java:1477-1479) with G variance * 0.8 and B variance * 0.6

primary_noise.note: Same noise as sandstone side from TextureAtlas.java:1495-1497

red_sandstone_top_steps: 1. Calculate local coordinates: pX = globalX % 16, pY = globalY % 16
6. Apply colors: r = 200 + variation, g = 100 + variation * 0.8, b = 50 + variation * 0.6
red_sandstone_side_steps: 1. Calculate local coordinates: pX = globalX % 16, pY = globalY % 16
2. Calculate wavy band: wavyPY = pY + sin(pX * 0.3 + tileX * 0.5) * 1.5
4. Apply band shading factor based on band number
7. Apply base colors with band shading and variance reduction
8. Check for inclusions: if combinedNoise < 0.12, set to red inclusion color

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded red sandstone algorithms
metadata.complexity: Advanced multi-face with red palette and banding

differences_from_sandstone.colors: Red sand palette (200,100,50) instead of beige (235,225,190)
differences_from_sandstone.variance_reduction: Green and blue variances reduced to maintain red tint
